value: Summer 2009, a great pizza/pastas/bar near the sea, called Relax. Super offers, very good food, everyone there is very nice, very kind, they speak Greek, English and Hungarian.
Very good icecreams can be found at the "Gelateria", near the center of Sarti. It is an Italian icecream shop, but people there speak many languages, including Greek, English, Hungarian, Italian.

Excellent rooms at Sinapis George, on the main street. Cheap rooms, 3 persons (or 4) per room, very good services. It is not a hotel, but a house owned by a family, who also own a store. The most rooms have direct sea view (in front of the hotel there is a street, a parking, and then directly the beach).
